net.openhft.chronicle.map

Class MapEventListeners

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.map.MapEventListeners

  • public final class MapEventListeners
extends Object
    Methods returning useful implementations of MapEventListener.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <K,V,M extends ChronicleMap<K,V>> 
      MapEventListener<K,V,M>      		 bytesLogging()
      Returns the map event listener, which logs strings like "Meta: [meta bytes] | [key bytes] = [value bytes]", where bytes are meta, key and value areas from Bytes passed to MapEventListener methods, printed in ASCII coding.
      static <K,V,M extends ChronicleMap<K,V>> 
      MapEventListener<K,V,M>      		 keyValueLogging()
      Returns the map event listener, which logs strings like "map file opType key value", where opType is either "get", "put" or "remove", to the logger provided by SLF4J.
      static <K,V,M extends ChronicleMap<K,V>> 
      MapEventListener<K,V,M>      		 nop()
      Returns the no-op event listener, i.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • nop

        public static <K,V,M extends ChronicleMap<K,V>> MapEventListener<K,V,M> nop()
        Returns the no-op event listener, i. e. all it's method implementations have empty bodies.
        Type Parameters:
        K - the map key type
        V - the map value type
        M - the ChronicleMap subclass, or ChronicleMap type itself. Typically this type should be just ChronicleMap.
        Returns:
        the no-op event listener

      • bytesLogging

        public static <K,V,M extends ChronicleMap<K,V>> MapEventListener<K,V,M> bytesLogging()
        Returns the map event listener, which logs strings like "Meta: [meta bytes] | [key bytes] = [value bytes]", where bytes are meta, key and value areas from Bytes passed to MapEventListener methods, printed in ASCII coding.
        Type Parameters:
        K - the map key type
        V - the map value type
        M - the ChronicleMap subclass, or ChronicleMap type itself. Typically this type should be just ChronicleMap.
        Returns:
        the bytes logging event listener

      • keyValueLogging

        public static <K,V,M extends ChronicleMap<K,V>> MapEventListener<K,V,M> keyValueLogging()
        Returns the map event listener, which logs strings like "map file opType key value", where opType is either "get", "put" or "remove", to the logger provided by SLF4J.
        Type Parameters:
        K - the map key type
        V - the map value type
        M - the ChronicleMap subclass, or ChronicleMap type itself. Typically this type should be just ChronicleMap.
        Returns:
        the logging event listener
